column2: How [do/did] you usually buy [cigarettes/a pouch of roll-your-own cigarette tobacco] for yourself? Is it...
column10: For current smokes, display 'do'; for 12-month former smokers, display 'did'; for current or 12-month former smokers who smoke manufactured cigarettes, display 'cigarettes'; for current and 12-month former smokers who smoke roll-your-own cigarettes, display 'a pouch of roll-your-own cigarette tobacco
column20: 4 = I [do/did] not buy my own [cigarettes/cigarette tobacco]

column10: ASK IF Q1=1; For current smokers, display 'Do'; for former smokers, display 'Did'; For smokers who smoke manufactured cigarettes, display 'cigarettes'; else, 'roll-your-own cigarette tobacco'

column2: Where [do/did] you buy your [cigarettes/roll-your-own cigarette tobacco] most of the time?
column10: ASK IF Q1=1; For current smokers, display 'Do'; for former smokers, display 'Did'; For smokers who smoke manufactured cigarettes, display 'cigarettes'; else, 'roll-your-own cigarette tobacco'
column17: 1 = A convenience store or gas station
column18: 2 = A supermarket, grocery store, or drug store
column19: 3 = A warehouse club, such as Sam's or Costco
column20: 4 = A smoke shop, tobacco specialty store, or tobacco outlet store
column21: 5 = A duty-free shop or military commisionary
column22: 6 = A bar, pub, restaurant, or casino
column24: 8 = A swap meet or flea market
column25: 9 = A store on an Indian reservation

column10: ASK IF Q1=1; For current smokers, display 'Do'; for former smokers, display 'Did'; For smokers who smoke manufactured cigarettes, display 'cigarettes'; else, 'roll-your-own cigarette tobacco'
